name: Poominati
description:
Arrows to move, Space to poop, Enter to restart.

Avoid the UFOs and fertilize your flowers to win.

"Poominati" is to be considered an interactive music video, where the music inspired through synesthesia the game design and art.

For this reason, no sound effects are used and the game is somewhat simple to beat.

Game by FrenziedPlatypus
tw:@playorbust

Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/FrenziedPlatypus

Music by Young Bronson: illuminarpi.org
